comments: Took him for statistics in Fall 16 for one day and immediately dropped. Heavy accent and does not make sense whatsoever when teaching. Does not like questions. Extremely unclear when explaining. Avoided him and took another stats class.
his tests are hard. only 3 students were passing in his class. so he said 80 is an A. otherwise we would be dead!!!
NOT AS HARD AS EVERYONE IS SAYING, BUT YOU NEED 2 LEARN ON YOUR OWN AT TIMES, B/C SOMETIMES HE IS UNCLEAR.. STAY ABOVE THE CLASS, AND YOU WILL GET A DECENT GRADE OUT OF HIM.

He\'s a terrible professor. His tests are very hard and tricky. He can\'t teach. He makes stupid jokes and he is friendly in a fake way. He doesn\'t like to give student UW because he\'s lazy. Don\'t take him, waste of time and money.

u will understand what he does in the class. but when he gives tests, it extremely hard. tests are not related to what he does in the class or for hw. he is annoyed easily & if he does not like u, he will definitely fail u. so be careful!! if u want to fail, take him!
dont take this professor. do yourself a fav. dont waste your money. he is horrible.
do not take him. he is a horrible teacher. can not teach.
